scripts.postclone: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run build  && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run build  && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link @progress-nativechat/nativescript-nativechat && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build  && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build  && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build  && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @progress-nativechat/nativescript-nativechat && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare-ng: npm run build  && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @progress-nativechat/nativescript-nativechat && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
